alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 5:28PM CDT until April 17 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Holmes County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Attala County in central Mississippi... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 528 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lexington to Coxburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Lexington around 535 PM CDT. Ebenezer around 540 PM CDT. Franklin and Bowling Green around 545 PM CDT. Durant, Goodman and Pickens around 555 PM CDT. Possumneck around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include West. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
